action-requires-restart: This action requires restart to apply changes
action-restart-copy: Your preference will be saved and applied the next time Tari Universe is started.
confirm-import-wallet-copy:
Are you sure you want to import a new wallet?
Your current wallet will be abandoned.

custom-power-levels.cpu-warning: Sustained high CPU usage may cause overheating, and hardware failure.
custom-power-levels.gpu-warning: Sustained high GPU usage may cause overheating, and hardware failure.
custom-power-levels.title: Custom Mode

errors.fetch-tor-bridges: Failed to fetch Tor bridges. Check your internet connection or try again later.

experimental-warning: ⚠️ Warning: These features are under active development and could behave unpredictably. Please proceed carefully.
fallback-info: Selected miner failed to start, used fallback miner instead.
gpu-device-enabled-description: Enable or disable specific GPU device.
gpu-mining-not-recommended: Detected low end hardware, gpu mining is not recommended
gpu-not-available-on-macos: ⚠️ GPU mining is not available on macOS
gpu-unavailable: ⚠️ GPU disabled because your hardware does not support it

idle-timeout.title: Time after which mdchine is considered idle

importing-wallet-copy: Tari Universe will restart automatically once your wallet has been imported
invalid-stats-server-port-empty: Stats server port cannot be empty
is-on-orphan-chain: You seem to be connected to a fork, and not the main chain. Any blocks you win might be invalidated.
last-block-added-time: Time since previous block was added to the chain: {{time}}
low-hash-rate-warning: Your hash rate is very low. Try closing all apps other than Tari Universe

agent-config.description: Copy the configuration below to connect an AI agent to Tari Universe
agent-config.or-add-to-settings-json: Or add this to your settings JSON:
agent-config.title: Agent Configuration

server-toggle.description: Enable the MCP server to allow AI agents to interact with Tari Universe
server-toggle.title: MCP Server

token-display.description: Use this token to authenticate MCP clients
token-display.revoke-confirm: Are you sure? This will stop the MCP server and require generating a new token.
token-display.title: Bearer Token

transactions.description: Allow MCP clients to send transactions (requires PIN)
transactions.title: Transactions

mine-on-app-start.description: When enabled, the app will start mining automatically when it is launched.
mine-on-app-start.title: Mining on startup

mining-toggle-warning: Mining will be paused while the changes take effect.

node.confirm-warning: Moving your base node location could result in losing your existing chain data. If this happens you will have to resync.
node.data-subtitle: Set a custom location to store the base node data

node-configuration-description: Connect with Remote, Local or both until your Local is ready to use
not-connected-to-tari: Not connected to the Tari Network

paper-wallet.connect-wallet-to-phone: Track your XTM balance on your phone
paper-wallet.do-not-share-this-code: Don't share this code with anyone

pause-on-battery-mode.description: Pause mining when device is disconnected from charging
pause-on-battery-mode.title: Pause on Battery Mode

pool-mining-description: When enabled, you will mine in a pool and join a group of miners.

pre-release.description: Explore the latest features before they go live and provide feedback
pre-release.title: Use pre-release version

pre-release-note: You are about to switch to the pre-release version of the application. This version can offer exciting new features and enhancements, with the possibility of encountering areas that may still be under refinement.
refresh-wallet-history-description: Scan and validate all your transactions
reset-config-explainer: This option removes all configuration, settings, databases, logs, peers, etc., but will keep the wallet database so you retain your existing wallet address and balance.
reset-config-explainer-wallet: This option will remove all configuration, settings, databases, logs, peer connections, etc. for everything in Universe, including your existing wallet address and balance.
reset-config-title: Reset all configuration settings, but leave wallet intact
reset-config-title-wallet: Reset all configuration settings, and generate a new wallet
reset-permanently: Are you sure you want to reset all settings permanently?
reset-restart: Tari Universe will restart automatically once the reset is complete
set-dynamic-fail-data: Set custom urls for monero nodes
setup-tor-settings: Setup Tor Settings for Privacy Control and Connectivity

should-auto-start.description: When enabled, the app will start automatically when you log in to your computer.
should-auto-start.title: Auto-start on system boot

stable-version-note: By turning off the pre-release version of the application, you will revert to the stable release, which prioritizes reliability and consistency. While you may miss out on the latest features and enhancements.

task-tray.description: Tari universe will be minimized to task tray after closing
task-tray.title: Run app from task tray on close

use-auto-update.description: When enabled, the app will check for updates and install them automatically.
use-auto-update.title: Update Tari Universe automatically

your-feedback: Describe your issue, including your Telegram handle if you have one, so that we can contact you with updates.
